snippet: The stabbing of Palwasha Tokhi adds to a toll that was already the deadliest for the news media in the country since the fall of the Taliban.
abstract: Afghan woman Palwasha Tokhi becomes the seventh journalist killed in Afghanistan so far in 2014, adding to a toll that has already made 2014 by far the deadliest year for the news media there since the fall of the Taliban.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: The stabbing of Palwasha Tokhi adds to a toll that was already the deadliest for the news media in the country since the fall of the Taliban.

headline.main: In Brutal Year, 7th Journalist Is Killed in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: In Brutal Year, 7th Journalist Is Killed in Afghanistan
